biography: Dr. Vivek Nangia is an internationally renowned Interventional Pulmonologist with over three decades of clinical experience. He currently serves as the Principal Director and Head of the Institute of Respiratory, Critical Care, and Sleep Medicine at Max Hospital, Saket. He is a pioneer of Medical Thoracoscopy in Delhi and is recognized for his expertise in critical care, sleep medicine, and infectious diseases.
aiSummary: Vivek Nangia is a interventional pulmonology specialist with an H-index of 110 at Max Super Speciality Hospital, Saket (Principal Director & Head of Institute). Known for pioneered Pioneer of Medical Thoracoscopy in Delhi and performed 1,000+ verified procedures and impacted an estimated 5,000 lives. Has been published in JAMA oncology, The Lancet.
